analysis.description:
RPTToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/13/0xc9320fbe0f9925f17221a461e1f0883cae1f109e.sol#143-144) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/13/0xc9320fbe0f9925f17221a461e1f0883cae1f109e.sol#36)

RPTCrowdsale.endCrowdfund (/unique_chucks/13/0xc9320fbe0f9925f17221a461e1f0883cae1f109e.sol#289-308) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(remainingTokenHolder,remainingToken) (/unique_chucks/13/0xc9320fbe0f9925f17221a461e1f0883cae1f109e.sol#300-304)

	- token.transfer(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/13/0xc9320fbe0f9925f17221a461e1f0883cae1f109e.sol#320-328)
